findings.title: 'missing_tests' category in config has no backing checker
findings.issue: The gap_categories config includes 'missing_tests' (line 1196), and the roadmapSchema GapCategory enum doesn't include it either — it's only in the scrutinizeRoadmap() default config. No checker produces gaps with this category.
findings.impact: The 'missing_tests' category is a dead config entry. Test coverage isn't verified by the scrutinizer.
findings.fix: Either add a checkTestCoverage() checker that flags units without test deliverables, or remove 'missing_tests' from the config.
